description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 10/06/2005

Eric demands to know why Stephanie is so set on destroying someone else’s family. Eric believes that Stephanie is fueled by her desire for revenge where Brooke is concerned. Dante informs Bridget that he wants her to be with him and not Nick. Later, Bridget asks her mother if she has feelings for Nick. Brooke assures Bridget that Nick is hers. Jackie fumes when she learns that Stephanie is up to her old tricks. Jackie warns Stephanie to leave everyone alone or else she will take her down for good.
